website_summaries.verdict: If you're willing to pay a premium, the Bose SoundLink Wireless Mobile speaker is the best portable Bluetooth speaker on the market.
pros: For such a small, portable Bluetooth speaker, the Bose SoundLink Wireless Mobile sounds great and plays impressively loud without distorting
It also has a built-in rechargeable battery, an auxiliary input, a rugged design, and the option to swap out protective covers (one of which is included)
cons: The speaker is pricey and has no speakerphone capabilities

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker  Buy it !
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for 10 years ! It performs flawlessly every day at work. The battery still is good for hours. It is so great that I am buying a second one. The sound is amazing. Buy it !
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy a cheaper similar one.
customer_reviews.text: There are similar ones that are less expensive. It works as expected so I only gave 4 stars because you can find better deals. It easily connects via Bluetooth, have a great sound quality as expected from a Bose, it's light so good to take for trips, won't have much impact on your luggage size or weight and it can get loud as well so you may use for small mobile parties.
customer_reviews.author: Muniz

customer_reviews.title: it might be one of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: This little guy has accompanied me to almost all my travels, the battery lasts almost 8 hours in a row using bluetooth, if you use an aux cable it will last longer. The design is very practical, once some friend accidentally threw it to the ground and it countinued to work perfectly. I've owned this speaker for 2 years maybe and I love it. Recently it has had so issues with the bluetooth connection but it might be because I use it near a router in my office. Other than that it might be one of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.author: dps812

customer_reviews.title: Not just a speaker, it's a Lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: Amazing amazing amazing. It works - blue tooth connects with no hitch. For those persons wanting a remote control for this unit here's what I do and trust me cause this works. I bought a and pair it with my Bose SoundLink. Once paired I use the iPod touch as master / remote control. I just turn up the volume on the SoundLink to almost max and then use the volume keys iPod Touch 4g (whether on screen or to the side) ro adjust the volume as my listening taste changes. I guess any fourth gen iPod touch would do the trick. However even in its own the Bose SoundlLink has no equal.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my college age son for CHristmas a couple of years ago - it is still working and goes with him everywhere - camping, in the boat, to the beach. WHen he is around I use it to boost the sound of my laptop when watching Netflix or Hulu etc It is Great. THe same year I gave my 2 daughters the mini Geneva potable radio, speakers which are smaller but more awkward and because they fold the little plastic pieces broke almost immediately. THe GEneva speakers still work and the sound is quite good but the battery doesn't last as long as these.
customer_reviews.author: Michele P. Olender

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound and easy to connect and transport
customer_reviews.text: I lived in Mexico for one year and this speaker was my companion. I used to connect my IPAD 2nd gen via bluetooth at the Bose Soundlink and the TV via HDMI on my iPAD. Amazing Sound for movies and music. It also works with my IPOD 3rd Gen. I am very pleased with the sound and easy to plug via blueetooth. Also the range of it is great. The only room for improvement is that there is no leds for volume. The cover provides pretty good protection. It does not fit in a briefcase but I travel with it on my carry-on. The battery has great performance and it is good to carry it outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Wallace

customer_reviews.title: BOSE does it yet again!
customer_reviews.text: Being a fan and owner of bose electronics..I must say i had somewhat some doubt being a lover of music an already an owner of the jambox portable speaker..I decided to take a risk an order the bose soundlink speaker. And just as i suspected Bose once again created a portable speaker that not only wowed me but reassured me that i spent my money wisely..the sound far percieves its small size the bass is rich and the sound is not distorted at loud volumes. With bluetooth capabilities as well as additional plugging options this unit is definately my top summer music box.. And most likely be the talk of anyone whom owns it!
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: If only the high end were stronger...
customer_reviews.text: I've long been a BOSE fan but this disappointed me - simply too much bass with not enough high end. Odd thing, BOSE usually owns the high end - it's what I like about them in general and I've bought a LOT of BOSE over the years. Otherwise, it's pimp - rock solid, well made, long battery life, tidy and small, simple to use though I've noticed some have a hard time connecting. Me? I want to hear the melody, not just the thump. Now if you're a Thumper, this thing has gotta be perfect...
customer_reviews.author: D_Man

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear and POWERFUL for its size!
customer_reviews.text: This little box rocks! Rich distinct bass even at low volumes, as you push the volume it still sounds crisp. I gave it a little bass test playing The Chemical Brothers - Under the Influence, This track with its deep extended bass could easily blow lesser speakers. The bass didn't crackle even at high volume, nor did it disrupt the clarity of the other elements in the track. With how powerful this is you will never need to blare it on its highest setting. I then played tracks where certain elements are only audible in headphones or with high end audio equipment. I heard all and I was amazed at its clarity. Bravo Bose! Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: AMZ-HNC

customer_reviews.title: The old version still holds up
customer_reviews.text: Striking a balance between portability and sound quality is difficult. This won't make everyone happy for either consideration, but it does a good job on both counts. Volume does not get as loud as many other larger speakers, but is still impressive for something this small. Unlike many other Bose models from the past, this model includes buttons with labels. A side by side comparison to the newer model makes it hard to tell the difference unless you listen very carefully with particularly demanding music. Similarly this outperforms the soundlink mini, oftentimes at a similar price. The size difference between the mini and this model is noticable, but slight.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and battery really lasts
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, this is a great, well-built, solid product that provides excellent sound for its size and intended purpose. You can use it for background sound at a party, but it will also pump out some pretty decent volume (and bass - if placed against a wall versus out in the open) - enough for those deck party sing-alongs - and the battery lasts at least 6 hours, even at decent volumes. All in all a pretty amazing feat considering the size. Bluetooth pairing was seamless and easy to setup. Kudos to Bose - I own their 901 Speakers and just LOVE them - glad to see they still make a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sorice

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Product from Bose
customer_reviews.text: Tried a JBL iPhone dock from Costco. Did not like the sound. Returned that one and ordered this one after reading through all the previous reviews. FYI, I actually tried the Bose Soundlink at a local Bestbuy once and honestly wasn't much impressed. However, I decided to gamble because of all the positive comments. Now I just cannot be happier. In my opinion, it is worth every penny. I have no idea how Bose made such rich sound out of this little box, but my suggestion is simple, buy it even if it is a little stretch. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: simply the best
customer_reviews.text: you can serch all over and try 10 other products and I get you come to this one for purchase. I have tried many audio sources over time and I tell you I go back to the bose every time. it may cost a bit more than the other junk on the market but you have to pay for a better product most of the time. looks great...sounds great and very unpluged and fully charged it takes up no space. just get it and stop looking around. if you get the old modle ...all that is changed is a tri fold base and the battery light you will save 30.00. but it already and stop looking...
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive piece of equipment but Bose have done really well to get good sound quality from something so small. It feels solid and is sturdy, the construction is well made. It is very portable and I like being able to move the speakers around the house without any wires. I have paired the Bose to both my iPad and MacBook Pro without any issues. Sounds quality is very good with a good amount of bass and battery life so far has been excellent. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dean08

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker a few weeks ago and to date I cannot find one bad thing to say. The sound quality is just amazing and can get pretty loud! the battery last for a long time... it's very small and can be taken anywhere.. I always take it on my travels, it follows me in the bathroom, the roof deck, the beach, the swimmingpool. My friends are also impressed when they see/hear it. the price is a bit high but for the quality you get it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ludwig Defrenne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is AMAZING, I purchased it for the office so my fellow Soldiers could all use one set of speakers. It is totally intuitive to operate, and I now plan to purchase one for my house as well. The sound is excellent from such a small package compared to other brands, mute automatically activates for phone calls with the music resuming immediately, and design itself is stylish enough for any modern office. This is an excellent purchase that no one will regret.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Ball

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, girlfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend. I charged it up and paired it with my phone; it paired easily and immediately. The sound is quite good and plenty loud enough for most single-room usage. Volume can be controlled independently on the speaker and the phone/device it's paired with which is quite convenient. It's pricey, but it's a great unit for someone who likes to listen to music via their phone and can appreciate the mobility aspect.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to Bose Name
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product and returned it. We have the Sound Dock and absolutely love it. Awesome sound and powerful for such a small item. This one doesn't provide the same sound quality. Not even close. You expect a bit of a trade for performance on wireless but this sounds like an off brand speaker in an 80's mini boom box. Maybe the tech will improve. Otherwise just plug in your devise.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This speaker worked right out of the box. It synced effortlessly with our ipad and iphone. Sound quality is outstanding. We highly recommend this. All our visitors likewise think this is an amazing little speaker. It is small, sits on our kitchen counter and blends in nicely with our stainless steel kitchen appliances. We highly recommend this product. We also like the fact that we can effortlessly switch between my iphone, my wifes iphone or her ipad to listen to music. No need for cables or a docking station.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Got them today after ordering them 2 days ago. This is the best sounding Bose System I have ever heard(other then Bose 901 speakers). My Bose Wave Radio quit working after spending 9 years on the road with me. Now I have a Motorala Xoom Tablet and Bose Wireless speakers. Big sound little box. Easy to pair with your blue tooth devices (took less then a minute). I can keep going but I am busy listening to my music on my Xoom/Bose Wireless Speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Yooper RP Tech

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundLink, WORTH THE CASH $
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker for a few key features. It has Bluetooth, it's rechargeable, compact, and Bose. I am not disappointed. For the size and the price, the sound is amazing. It's awesome and super portable. I ruled out the Dre Beats because of size and I didnt feel like throwing $10 worth of batteries at it and carrying another $10 for backup. The charge lasts ALL night by the campfire. WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: 317-GOT-TINT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my speaker yesterday. Immediately after taking it out of the box I paired with my ipod touch. Then I paired it with my blackberry. Then I paired it with my PC. The sound is amazing and it is so easy to use. I love it and can't believe it took me so long to buy a speaker for my ipod. At least I chose the right one!
customer_reviews.author: CTree

customer_reviews.title: Expected more.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product but not great.battery last a long time and size is perfect and good low end frequency.. Can handle high volume but its missing high frequency. Audio is not as crisp as I'd like it to be and ive tested the 2nd and 3rd generation, and im still not impressed with the high frequency even when hooked up via audio cable playing cd.
customer_reviews.author: theCURE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this almost a year now and use it almost every day. I keep it in the bathroom and always have beats to listen to. Before I had a new blue tooth vehicle I even brought it in the car for long rides. The charge lasts for a good 3 hours. I paid $200 for it and know there are a lot more options out there now that may have the same sound quality and be a lot less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: While I do not know if it "sounds" good, for my purposes, it rocks. Long battery life, great range, and loud sound are perfect for my needs. If I wanted to listen to high quality audio, I would purchase headphones or sit infront of a nice pair of speakers.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: I received the speaker yesterday, I had it out of the box and paired with my iPad 3 in under 2 minutes. The speaker itself feels very sturdy and you can tell it is made of quality materials. The sound is very good for a small unit. It also gets pretty loud as well. I can't really speak to how long the battery lasts, but I'm sure t will be close to what Bose says it does. All in all I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ScoLow

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound quality and volume this speaker puts out. I've used it many, many times and stay amazed at how such a small thing can put out tons of sound. It synced with my phone quickly and hasn't been buggy with the Bluetooth connection (except for my laptop, several dropped connections with it). I find excuses to drag this along with me just so I can enjoy what it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Walls

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, room filling deep base and overall great sound presence. Easy to use. Easy to carry, battery life could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, room filling deep base and overall great sound presence. Easy to use. Easy to carry, battery life could be better but OK.
customer_reviews.author: Izak K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, small and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Like most reviews here, I really like the Bose SoundLink. It paired with my Macbook in just a few seconds, and I just had to go into my Macbook's system preferences and switch the output from internal speakers to the Bose unit, which appears automatically in the menu. Bass sounds really full and great for a unit this size -- not boomy at all. The best is it's incredibly stylish design. Very slick and sleek. I will be carrying this with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Huang

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Bose speaker 6/6/2019 and I put it to charge all night and it won't turn on I know my model is the old version (404600) I'm fixing to return this item
customer_reviews.author: Jose A.Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic. It took longer to get the speaker out of the box than it did to hook it up using the bluetooth on my iphone. The sound is phenomenal considering the compact size and how awesome is it to sit out on the porch and rock out?! The only problem I have had is I had to use the aux cable to hook it to my mac, instead of using bluetooth, but that may be a lack of expertise on my part. I received the speaker three days ago and I have probably listened to 10 or 12 hours of music already. The cost is slightly high, but it is SO worth it. Ahhh...Life is good.
customer_reviews.author: sheyo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker.
customer_reviews.text: We have one in the kitchen, and stream audio from our laptop in the living room. Works great unless you're standing right in front of the laptop and blocking the signal. Other than that, it is really quite a great box. The aux in on the back makes it completely portable and we often take it outside with us to play music while playing or eating. Sounds great, works great.
customer_reviews.author: John Bregar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have my iPhone and iPad paired with this device and I use them both when ever I am outside washing vehicles or working. The battery lasts a lot longer than I thought it ever would have...
customer_reviews.author: Jim Millman

customer_reviews.title: This is Best Speaker ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I entertain a LOT. We have a lot of friends in our neighborhood and we all get together several nights a week to cook dinner and sit on the deck and have drinks. This speaker is so easy to use and the battery lasts forever! The sound quality is amazing and I'm scared to test out how loud it will actually get! The best part - no cords and easy to transport. We will be taking it on many trips to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: goldengirl84

customer_reviews.title: even though she has outgrown the iPad & smart phone that she originally requested it for
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my daughter, she is still using her speaker, even though she has outgrown the iPad & smart phone that she originally requested it for. I'm pleased with the Bose quality and so is she.
customer_reviews.author: SleeplessInSummerville

customer_reviews.title: Music, but visual meda
customer_reviews.text: I think Bose, for my tastes in audio, about the best. However I was trying to use this product for watching movies and other media on my iPad when traveling. The bluetooth technology seems to have a bit of delay and movie and TV audio doesn't quite sync up. A disappointment. For music, it's wonderful... so over all: It's OK.
customer_reviews.author: MAC user

customer_reviews.title: Superb speaker
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth portable speaker has incredible sound and is the perfect solution for listening to Pandora, Songza and other computer generated music anywhere in the home - indoors and out. You can move it from the kitchen, to the yard, to the living room or anywhere you want in the house as it weighs very little. We even contemplated taking it for a week to a vacation home. It's a top notch product and great value compared to other ways of getting superb sounding music anywhere in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound - best purchase I've made in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I'm admittedly not a huge bose fan and I consider myself an aspiring audiophile. I've invested thousands of dollars and hundreds of hours of research into my home theater sound system so, I consider myself knowledgeable on this topic (but not necessarily an expert). This little speaker sounds amazing... and I'm constantly surprised at the quality of sound it puts out and it's ability to fill the room with sound. The only thing this speaker is missing is a speakerphone so I can accept an incoming call like the jambox has. However, I would recommend this speaker over the jambox... i've heard both and this is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Luke the "nuke"

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this speaker! The quality is great for its size and the size is fantastic for it's portability. It's wonderful to take on trips and I put it in the kitchen when I'm cooking to listen to music from my iPad. When I bought it I thought it was a bit pricey but now I see that it's a great value and I'm so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Van Treese

customer_reviews.title: Really shines for listening to piano/classical music.
customer_reviews.text: A high-end listening experience; decent bass response and excellent mid-hi range. Really shines for listening to piano/classical music. Portable and extremely easy to pair with all bluetooth devices. Holds a charge really well -- worth the money to get the best!
customer_reviews.author: TPH1983

customer_reviews.title: wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker, use it all the time. I even brought it to a craft Christmas sale & played music off my I pad & it filled the room. It's a great investment that you will enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Judith Morris

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I have the jawbone, but the kids loved this because the phone doesn't have to be attached to it to run the playlist, and it has a battery which lets you play it outside without a cord. The sound from both is great, but the Bose "goes to 11" and is appreciably louder. I guess that's a good thing...
customer_reviews.author: HuntingFool

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundLink has way too much bass.
customer_reviews.text: After many searches I ordered the Bose SoundLink to use with my iPhone4s and Ipad3. The unit is very well made and attractive. It was very easy to sinc and get the music playing. The sound quality is very good, but the bass is way too strong, and can't be adjusted. If you want a boomy bass, you will probably like this speaker. The iPhone and the iPad have simple equalizer settings, and I tried them all.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker!
customer_reviews.text: We love this, we use it all the time. Inside, outside, wherever. The bluetooth is perfect. The only downfall is that you cannot put the device playing the music too close because it will go in and out on you. You just need to keep it about 5 feet away from the speaker. It is quality sound, as expected from Bose. Would definitely recommend to everyone!! And it is so portable with the cover built in to keep it scratch free.
customer_reviews.author: mh

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundLink at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker system for my husband's birthday. He had tried out so very many mini-speakers and was disappointed in their sound quality. The minute he linked this to his Asus Eee-Pad, he was in Heaven!!! Wireless keeps linked outside all the way to the street and he is extremely happy with the quality! Needless to say, I am happy that he is happy!
customer_reviews.author: LQTravel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound from a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works right out the box. Just hold the bluetooth button doen to activate, search, connect & go. Also includes an in-port for cd player & older cell phones that don't have bluetooth. The music sounds crisp clear & battery lasts for 5-6 hrs on a full charge. It doesn't get better than bose!
customer_reviews.author: G. Estrada, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: of course
customer_reviews.text: It's Bose so what kind of rating would you expect? I do think that the jambox is it's competition though. I've bought both as gifts and both were worth it. This one however, is not as portable as it seems. It's definitely bigger than the small jambox which also sounds pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Another great Bose Product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Bose radio a few weeks before this purchase. Loved it, can't beat the sound quality. Decided to purchase this speaker for my MP-3 player. Same great sound quality. Love the portability of the speaker. Battery life is great 8-10 hours on a charge. Great for outdoors at the pool, can play loudly, or can put on the table and play just for me. LOVE!LOVE!LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: kbud

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound from a small package, but...
customer_reviews.text: ...I'm having to continually re-pair my devices. I bought mine about 4 months ago. The Soundlink doesn't remember my MacBook Pro or Iphone. I eventually get there, but having to continually reset and do the Soundlink Tango in order to enjoy the speakers is a hassle - especially considering the sticker price. That being said, for travel and smaller spaces the output of these speakers should satisfy most listeners.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I changed from the Bose Sounddock Portable because I got the iPhone 5. I decided Bluetooth is the way to go just in case apple decides to keep changing the dock in the future. The device is very well priced for Bose and handles all of my needs. I live in a 2 bedroom apartment and sounds great and can easily fill the room.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Greatest little speaker ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Bose speaker is the greatest little speaker. I dont need to take my radio anywhere, just pick up my speaker and go. And talk about sounding great and having bass. Its also very loud. Its great to have my tunes where ever and whenever I want them. I like how it turns off automaticaly when you close the lid. And its light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I have a lot of Bose products and have NEVER been disappointed in one before. Until now. This is very poor. Too much base, no highs at all. Horrible sound quality. Would expect this out of a $50 speaker at Walmart, not Bose. Not much else needs to be said. I'm returning...
customer_reviews.author: Lee I.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best speaker we've ever had. So convenient. The ONLY problem with it is that if another iphone or computer in the house has been connected to it via bluetooth, you must find that item and disconnect it before connecting it to another one. In a home with a variety of devices, it gets a little confusing sometimes. But, we really are pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas to use with our ipad. It is one of the nicest things we own. The sound quality is amazing. It looks nice on a shelf or any where you put it. It is loud! Works flawlessly. Great for travel. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a high quality speaker.
customer_reviews.author: FJS64

customer_reviews.title: The sounds of music!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews, company reputation, and my friend had one. Without hearing other Bluetooth speakers, I can't compare to other products. But for this one, I am very pleased. Is it a home theater or stereo system? No, as that is not the purpose. Is it convenient for listening to music in different locations? Quite. Sound is great and the battery life is impressive, too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Can someome say WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a bday present for when I go on vacation to bring with me to the beach, family gatherings etc. The sound that comes out of this small box is phenomenal! I noticed it is more powerful when you have it plugged in but not too much difference. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this compact little unit - the sound is great, the convenience of the recharging battery but is a tad heavy for my backpack if the trips are long. Course I have the best sound on the trail when I bring it, the rest of the time it doubles as my computer speaker and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Dilema

customer_reviews.title: 6 years old and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker in 2011, it is now 2017. Still sounds like the first day I received it- awesome!
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Great.
customer_reviews.text: This was our first venture into Bluetooth portable speakers. Pretty swell, nice sound but as is typical of Bose not able to really jack it up. If you your tastes run to classical music and soft sounds this is more than adequate. Difficult to program however.
customer_reviews.author: cloud2013

customer_reviews.title: Alot from a little package
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking about getting a AirPlay device but decided on getting this Bluetooth wireless mobile speaker. It sounds great and is easy to set up. I was worried about sound quality of Bluetooth vs AirPlay but it does not seem like an issue. Also Bluetooth will support devices beyond Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this speaker. I take it to all the trips plus this is great for picnic and any outdoor activities in general. The sound is clear and loud. It is really nice not having to plug in my ipod everytime I what to use it.
customer_reviews.author: zentriton

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the Hype.
customer_reviews.text: This little black box totally lives up to the hype. I remember seeing those TV commercials back in the day and being like, "dang, those are pretty pricy!" But I never had the chance to hear one of their systems until recently and I have to say that the sound quality is incredible. The depth of the base is second to none and really surprising because of the size of the unit. Other sound docks that I've owned have been good, but until you hear this one you don't really understand what you're missing. I love my HDTV, but if it had bluetooth I'd use this box instead of the built-ins. This thing is freak'n awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mace

customer_reviews.title: Intense sound for the size
customer_reviews.text: I use it with my iMac and also my iPad. The sound is excellent and you get a lot of quality sound considering how compact the unit is. Pricey but worth it. Set up is extremely easy and you can match it with six different components. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K.B. LACA

customer_reviews.title: Music on the go
customer_reviews.text: There are several bluetooth music players, but the Bose Soundlink has the best sound I've heard from one of these players. Deep bass, accurate mid-tones and tight highs make this the one to buy. The literature states that it will run for up to two hours or so at a high volume on its built-in rechargeable battery, but I've had it playing for up to four hours without the need to plug it in. It's not cheap, but it's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RJK25

customer_reviews.title: Love This Device!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't purchase this due to the negative reviews other had posted. They could not have been more wrong. The player is very easy to link to, and switching devices is not a problem at all! The sound quality is amazing considering how small this device is, and the battery life is great as well. This player is the best on the market, and well worth the money. Couldn't recommend it more.
customer_reviews.author: Stockton Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Like all Bose products this one delivers the sound quality that I expected. It is nice to be able to use it with my phone or ipad though the blue tooth feature without having to have cords connected. I found it very easy to set up (pushed a button).
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Fanastic Bose Sound out of a small box
customer_reviews.text: The Bose SoundLink is the BEST speaker system I have heard for Mobile use. Is it light very easy to set up and sound you would think is coming from a huge system. As always Bose has blown me away and I feel this unit is at a great price for the sound you get. The battery has a long life with no change in sound as it nears end of charge. Thank you Bose for a speaker system that gives my digital music the power and pure clean Bose sound I know and love.
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Bright

customer_reviews.title: Great portable sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intention of using it with my iPhone4. It works flawlessly! It's perfect for my classroom, great for washing the car and awesome around the campfire. It allows me to be in complete control of my music without having to be within a cord's length. The sound is excellent and the battery life has not been an issue whatsoever. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to use the freedom of bluetooth. Many of my friends have dumped their iPod docks for this Bose unit. I'm obviously very pleased. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CMac

customer_reviews.title: great sound, though slightly heavy
customer_reviews.text: This speaker gives awesome sound and is very solidly built. the size is nice, though it weighs a bit more than i'd like a traveling speaker to weigh. as another reviewer noted, the auxiliary input jack is oddly unfinished, but other than that the sounds is far better than what you would expect and justifies the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. brooks

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For!
customer_reviews.text: This product did everything I purchased it for and more! Used the auxilary adaptor cord to hook into the jack on my HDTV and greatly improved the cheap sound of those 2" TV speakers! Also, the bluetooth hooked right up to my computer and phone for listening to tunes. The sound is fantastic! Best purchase I've made in quite a while and well-worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RWM

customer_reviews.title: Very Good but not GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I have a few different portable speakers for my IPOD. And I use Bose Speakers for my home stereo. So I have some perspective. My home stereo speakers are GREAT. My other portable speaker are very good, so I was hoping that the Bose SoundLink Wireless Mobile Speaker would be Great. I could only give it a 4 stars rating based on sound. It does sound very good just not great. The best things about this speaker is the blue tooth, the automatic off system when you close the lid and the size. I will still be using it often.
customer_reviews.author: Small Time Audiophile

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I have these speakers for about 2 weeks now and I have to say they are amazing! The quality stays at it's best even at the max volume, the Bluetooth reaches about 30 feet away. And the base is amazing. The only negative I would say for this is the open/close tab, it gets kind of annoying to have it open while walking around. Other than that there really aren't any bad parts. This is a great item to use to play music in out door places and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Gleb Orlov

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker. I listen to a lot of piano music and most other speakers produce a very noticeable "hiss"...not with this speaker! It connects quickly to my devices and has an awesome sound. It is also very attractive. I wish it had a retracting handle for carrying but otherwise it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chimigi

customer_reviews.title: It's fun indoors or outdoors at parties
customer_reviews.text: This device makes listening to music on other wireless devices really convenient. It's fun indoors or outdoors at parties, etc.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Bose does it right
customer_reviews.text: OK - I use this for a mobile meetings and enjoy nice jazz playing in the background. If you want clear and clean music and need portable this is your answer. Also, Bluetooth was simple! Just push a button and it will sink to IPAD2 and my iPhone 4S simple and quick. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Family and Friends
customer_reviews.text: I got the SoundLink for my wife for Mother's Day. She absolutely loves the product. Upon hearing the quality of the sound and the ease of use from an I-Phone/I-Pad, my son and several friends ran out to buy the wireless speaker as well. I was a hero for buying it and an even bigger hero when others were excited about it as well. Thank you Bose and thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Radio

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for small rooms
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my birthday. (I've listed it on my wishes too...). It is absolutely great for my purpose. I'm mostly working from home so I want some music playing. I'm also a complete audiophile so it needs to sound good. I've tried all kinds of laptop speakers, etc. This one gives me extremely good sound with the feeling of a full room/concert hall. IF you can abstract from the source coming from ONE spot that is. I enjoy it compared to any kind of mobile speakers. It IS Bose quality. For a mobile speaker it can't be beat. Note: You can only (as most BT devices) only pair 5 devices at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money and buy this instead of JamBox
customer_reviews.text: Last spring I bought a JamBox by Jawbone. I liked it a lot. I liked it so much I bought one for each of my sons, and recommended that everybody should get bluetooth speakers. Then my JamBox died after only a couple months. So, I tried the Bose Soundlink speakers. Night and day as far as sound quality! If you want sound, go for the Bose. If you want cute, JamBox is cute. I'm sold on Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Buell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excelent sound quality (not as loud as a home theater but really good for its size), good battery life, easy bluetooth connection, really easy to use, I like it very much. It's a little bit heavy but that's the reason of the sound quality. Definately I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Wireless Speaker (Nylon)
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! I could not believe the quality of sound from this speaker. You get what you pay for and this is worth it. This will put a lot of two speaker sets to shame. Great for traveling or just going to the beach or park.
customer_reviews.author: Skiter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker rocks. Lightweight, portable, and fills a room with full sound only Bose can deliver. The only negative is it is not weather-proof. Not something you want to take camping or to the beach. Otherwise, Awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Charger issues
customer_reviews.text: The charger for this has never worked. My friends who have this product complain of the same thing. You have to hold the charger or it will not charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my Bose Soundlnk wireless speakers
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. It works flawlessly and sounds great. It's nice to be able to move it around the house but where I have it placed most of the time in my living room it keeps with my modern, minimalistic design not having wires and transformer boxes to hide.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Bose is the best
customer_reviews.text: Always love Bose. Got this for a friend for Christmas, he's in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: CW83186

customer_reviews.title: great speaker but I cant help being disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: its really a great speaker, especially for outdoors. Indoors, low volume, the high frequencies are really disappointing. I shouldn't have been surprised given all of the reviews. Wish I went with the big jambox.
customer_reviews.author: ka

customer_reviews.title: Best in Class
customer_reviews.text: This powerful little speaker is worth every penny! Having tried 2 other speakers, I can definitely say this one is tops. I'm not a techie, so I can't drone on about the bass or treble, etc. I just know it sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This is the Bose product I've been waiting for. I couldn't be more pleased with the ease of use, sound quality and portability. Synching is a breeze. Bose has really done it with this wireless speaker. Prices for Bose products are always an issue with me, but I'm not complaining about price vs. value with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Bose wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We use it in the house, on the deck and even for small group conf call trainings. Bring your iPad and use the headphone jack to run into the speaker and you've got facetime or a webinar or a video with plenty of volume for a small group training.
customer_reviews.author: Otis 77

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the Bose reputation.
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth mobile speaker is a great speaker to have. No problems at all setting up with my iPhone4 and iPad 2. Fills my study beautifully with music from my iTunes collection and even internet streamed radio stations. Price is slightly on the steep side though.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Quek

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: You sold a product to me without mentioning that the battery in the product is bad. I am really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy M.

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and high quality sound even with lower quality mp3 files. Well worth the cash. Bluetooth works flawlessly with iPhone, Android and Mac. Get it you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: John J Kidwell

customer_reviews.title: Leave it to Bose to nail it!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other wireless speaker systems and they all pale in comparison to this. Other brands are staticky and lack the quality sound and volume. This speaker is perfect. The blue tooth connection to my iPhone is great and the range between the iPhone and the Soundlink is excellent. The sound from this thing is as good as many far more expensive stereo systems. I am very happy with this product and heartily recommend it. If you can afford it, it is a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kotula

customer_reviews.title: nice for portability
customer_reviews.text: This unit is of high quality. Does not crank up to shake the ground, but at a reasonable volume, is just fine for sitting around with a small group. Full range speaker that is very portable. Best use, traveling lightly.
customer_reviews.author: jam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product that I received was a used product it was scratched up and the stand was missing
customer_reviews.author: Bianca H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome is the only word I have for this small looking powerhouse.. It was a gift for my wife who was looking for a home theater system.. At first she was not too impressed when she has the initial look.. but when I placed the speaker in a hall as per the directions given in its manual and attached it with her Sony Ericsson phone via bluetooth and played it aloud.. Oh my God was her reaction.. It was no less then a full blown home theater system (but remember you have to place it as mentioned in the manual).. It is a must go for any music lover...
customer_reviews.author: vikingsunil

customer_reviews.title: The best portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best portable speaker that I have bought in a very long time. Worth the money spent for the deep rich quality of sound from such a portable speaker. Take it with me on my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas, and she flipped for it. The sound is incredible, it pairs to her phone in seconds and plays all of her music in loud, high quality sound - anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: connecting is tough
customer_reviews.text: I bought one because I love Bose device. This one was disappointing because the Blue tooth is so tough to convect to. I gave up and just plug it in so the wireless/ battery part became useless. the sound is great, but I should have just bought plug in speakers. I bought a Jambox for mobile, and it is smaller, easier to connect with bluetooth and the battery last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Bose Vs. Jambox
customer_reviews.text: The Jawbone Big Jambox, against which we compared this the Bose SoundLink, sounded superior (less muddy) so we are returing the bose and keeping the Jambox. The Bose was louder, however, and wasn't as sensitive directionally, so it was a close call.
customer_reviews.author: derekdrew

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Would be awesome if bluetooth would allow to link to 2 Bose speakers at the same time. Super-convenient! Not the best for outdoors, unless it's right next to you.
customer_reviews.author: CM

product_meta.title: Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Wireless Speaker - Nylon (Old Version)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingShare the music on your mobile phone with sound quality unlike any other Bluetooth speaker. The SoundLink speaker works wirelessly with your iPhone, Android, Blackberry, tablet or laptop-and goes wherever you do for music whenever the moment calls for it.Pair and play the speaker with your Bluetooth device. It's simple-and you only need to do it once. Just press and hold the Bluetooth button on the top panel, then choose the SoundLink speaker from your smartphone or other source. It's now memorized, ready to play in an instant. Nothing to connect or dock. The speaker keeps up to six Bluetooth sources in memory. Play your music files or streaming content like Pandora and Rhapsody.
feature_bullets: Clear, detailed sound brings your music to life
Connects wirelessly to your mobile phone, tablet or other Bluetooth device
Compact and lightweight - fits in your bag or backpack
Built-in cover protects system and unfolds into a stand for instant music anywhere
Rechargeable lithium-ion battery provides up to 8 hours of non-stop music

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars584 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #3,148 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#23,831 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
